name: SMILE (Ratmanprisma)
description:
You are home alone on a dark night. And you get an email. It's an image of a smiley face. But it seems off

SMILE is a short Indie horror game that focuses on a 13-year-old child left home alone. And after viewing an Email. Is left to the mercy of the Smile.

You don't have to, but we would be very thankful if you donated. The more you donate, the more motivated we get to continue development and hey, maybe one day we can make a really big DLC! 

Spanish Version Coming Soon

Versión En Español Próximamente
